params.name: offset
params.description: Port offset allows you to run multiple WSO2 products, multiple instances of a WSO2 product, or multiple WSO2 product clusters on the same server or virtual machine (VM). Port offset defines the number by which all ports defined in the runtime such as the HTTP/S ports will be offset. For example, if the default HTTP port is 9443 and the port offset is 3, the effective HTTP port will be 9446. Therefore, for each additional WSO2 product instance, set the port offset to a unique value so that they can all run on the same server without any port conflicts.
